nodes.text: TC-9D0 was a brown-hued TC-series protocol droid wanted by the special branch of the Senatorial Guard for having "sensitive information" about the corrupt Twi'lek Senator Connus Trell.
In 32 BBY, the bounty hunter Jango Fett captured TC-9D0 and claimed the bounty for 2,500 credits on the streets of Merchant Row on Outland Transit Station.

In the video game Star Wars: Bounty Hunter, TC-9D0 is the first of ten possible secondary bounties that a player can secure in the Merchant Row section in Chapter One. Players have the option of capturing TC-9D0 or destroying him. If the droid is recovered in good condition, his bounty is valued at 2,500 credits. If he were destroyed, however, then the job would only earn the player 1,250 credits. He is also the only droid among all of the game's secondary bounties.
